data.text:
@wtrbfflo @SabinehazanMD @Lurknomore1 @EnemyInAState @NoyesJHumphrey I’m far more interested in the weight of what assessment scientists make of researches to date.. Okay?

https://t.co/VyErv21REL

@SabinehazanMD @wtrbfflo @Lurknomore1 @EnemyInAState @NoyesJHumphrey Published. How many paper reviews have you experienced since then that support your paper as reliable science showing ivermectin effectiveness against COVID19?
@Oxfordite @SabinehazanMD @Lurknomore1 @EnemyInAState @NoyesJHumphrey While armchair quarterbacks like us wax philosophy about what studies do or do not say.

@Oxfordite @SabinehazanMD @Lurknomore1 @EnemyInAState @NoyesJHumphrey I think Sabine’s point is that she is treating patients on the brink of death from COVID and is able to bring them back using multidrug therapy approach which fixes a lot of things in the body
@Lurknomore1 @wtrbfflo @EnemyInAState @NoyesJHumphrey Being on twitter for less than 1 month ≠ lurking.. you’ve not had sufficient time to be considered ‘lurking’  Seriously? 🤷‍♂️

@SabinehazanMD @wtrbfflo @Lurknomore1 @EnemyInAState @NoyesJHumphrey You may have read threads alike this one:
https://t.co/VyErv21REL

I’m not hearing a weight of scientists seeing evidence of ivermectin effectiveness versus COVID19.
But you do you best.
